connector.description: Upload data to AWS S3 in streaming upload mode.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.bucketNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The S3 Bucket name or ARN.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.region
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The AWS region to connect to. Example: eu-west-1

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.autoCreateBucket
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: Setting the autocreation of the S3 bucket bucketName.

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.restartingPolicy
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The restarting policy to use in streaming upload mode. There are 2 enums and the value can be one of override, lastPart

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.batchMessageNumber
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The number of messages composing a batch in streaming upload mode

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.batchSize
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The batch size (in bytes) in streaming upload mode

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.namingStrategy
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: The naming strategy to use in streaming upload mode. There are 2 enums and the value can be one of progressive, random

camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.name: camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-sink.keyName
camel.kamelet.aws-s3-streaming-upload-si.description: Setting the key name for an element in the bucket through endpoint parameter. In Streaming Upload, with the default configuration, this will be the base for the progressive creation of files.
